title: "Schipotle refuses to serve Brooklyn police officers"?
subtitle: Did Chepotle workers in Brooklyn refuse to serve eight NYPD officers?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The staff of the Mexican Chipotle Greel in Brooklyn refused to serve eight uniformed NYPD officers after they took the initiative of "Hands up, don't shoot" to point to their hatred of police officers.
